newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Sept 27.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Chinese newspapers - Sept 27.

text.p: Following is a summary of major Chinese political and business stories in leading newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Beijing. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy. Telephone: (8610) 6532-1921. Fax: (8610) 6532-4978.
China's Communist Party chief Jiang Zemin delivers a hardline speech on the importance of maintaining communist control of all media.
China closes thousands of small but heavily polluting factories that are wasting valuable resources and harming people's health.
Four state-owned commercial banks will increase loans to individual buyers of housing to try to promote the housing sector.
The State Economic and Trade Commission is drafting regulations on management in state-owned and share-holding companies.
